name: Treasure Travelers Demo
description:
I have made a 2D platformer game demo called "Treasure Travelers" created in Godot 3.2.3. I was following some of the Godot Tutorials from BornCG, but this what I came up as first-attempt practice.

The game development is in-progress. I came up with a short demo on how I was progressing so far with Godot. Later on, I may improve the production of this game once I become familiar with Godot.

Enjoy the game demo.

All Platformer assets were used from the Humble Bundle Pack and Kenny.nl.
